LanguageData.LetterFeenixPasses:
A Feenix is wandering through the area. 

Best described as a mixture of a lion and a phoenix, these legendary creatures are also known as fire incarnate. Said to be living fire, a Feenix heart is highly prized on the black market. 

While not inherintly hostile, even a solitary Feenix can lay waste to an entire colony if provoked. 

They can be tamed and even trained, but only by the bravest - and most fireproof - of men.
LanguageData.LetterIcicatPasses:
An Icicat is wandering through the area. 

Solitary and peaceful, these legendary creatures are also known as frost incarnate. Said to be living ice, an Icicat heart is highly prized on the black market. 

While docile, an enraged Icicat is a sight to behold. 

They can be tamed and even trained, but only by the bravest - and best insulated - of men.
LanguageData.RaptorArrived: Raptors arrived searching for food! Stay away! Oh, yeah. Oooh, ahhh, that's how it always starts. Then later there's running and um, screaming.
